title: How to Store Marzipan

steps.headline: Select the marzipan to be stored after removing it from the packaging.
steps.description: Cut away cleanly from the marzipan you're using.

steps.headline: Lay down a sheet of plastic food (cling) wrap.
steps.description: Cut the wrap larger than the piece of marzipan.

steps.headline: Wrap the marzipan tightly.
steps.description: Overlap the plastic wrap to ensure that air cannot enter the package.

steps.headline: Place the wrapped marzipan inside an airtight container.
Store.
steps.description: The marzipan will keep at room temperature in a dark, dry and cool place for up to 3 weeks.
